text: Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Nde mbarara. Gu mba phenan muuŋgirim, ana havhargirga kɨman vhuuŋ guarara, gu ana heav, ana ndi ndarigim, ana khar ki. Ana guigira kɨma havharar vhuuŋ ma. Gu ana ndi fagim, ana Saion mbɨkshɨman ki. Ana kaŋgiap, ana khothɨgi gumgi, mbe memɨra ndigirga tuktɨgi fhu.”
